summary: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.
cast: Gene Hackman|Al Pacino|Dorothy Tristan|Ann Wedgeworth|Richard Lynch|Eileen Brennan|Penelope Allen|Richard Hackman|Al Cingolani|Rutanya Alda|Mary Ann Brownlee|Nicholas Carbone|Frank Chartier|James G.
